question: Who of the following tops in the Forbes Rich List of sport stars?
explanation: According to the latest Forbes' Rich List Cristiano Ronaldo is the richest sports personality in the world. The Real Madridstriker has earned an incredible Â£70million in the last year, along with picking up another Champions Leaguemedal and becoming the inaugural winner of The Best FIFA Men's Player award. Indian cricket team captain Virat Kohli is the only cricketer to feature in the Top 100 list.
